short_summary: Replacing the roofing systems of several buildings at the Collins Bay Institution.
full_summary:
### Collins Bay Institution Roof Replacement
#### Amendment to Tender Notice

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has made amendments to the Request for Proposal (RFP) for roof replacement services at the Collins Bay Institution. The deadline for bid submission has been extended until September 27, 2023 at 14:00 EST.

**Key Information**
---------------

- **Tender #:** WS4139146341
- **Reference:** Rafx20327332
- **Category:** CNST - Building and facility maintenance and repair services, Roofing service
- **Location:** Collins Bay Institution, 1455 Bath Road, Kingston, Ontario, K7L 4V9
- **Contract Term:** The contract is expected to start upon award, with a duration of 5 months (subject to change).

**Objective**
------------

The PSPC seeks to contract a supplier to perform demolition of existing roofing systems and replace with new roofing systems on several buildings at the Collins Bay Institution. This project is in compliance with Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Canadian Government trade policies.

**Mandatory Site Visit**
----------------------

A mandatory site visit will take place on August 24, 2023 at 13:00 EST. Interested bidders must register their attendance by emailing ambreen.dhillon@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca by August 22, 2023 at 12:00 EST.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

- Name: Ambreen Dhillon, in her capacity as Procurement Officer, PSPC Department
- Email: ambreen.dhillon@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- Location: PSPC, 11 Laurier St. Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

Please visit the [Ariba Discovery](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17134188?extsite=MTcxMzQxODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) posting for further details.

**Tender Documents**
-------------------

Please note that this notice is an amendment to the initial tender notice. All bidders are to confirm attendance at the mandatory site visit to be eligible to bid on this project. The PSPC will not provide any further extensions to the bid submission deadline.

Best regards,
Ambreen Dhillon
Procurement Officer, PSPC
